Bridget Boakye bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana, onye sayensị data na onye edemede. O mebere TalentsinAfrica, otu n'ime usoro nka na-eto ngwa ngwa n'Afrịka na ikpo okwu ewebata.  Ụlọ ọrụ ya so na ụlọ ọrụ iri abuo kachasị ahọpụtara na October 2019 maka Harambe Entrepreneur Alliance na Bretton Woods, New Hampshire. Ụlọ ọrụ ya pụtakwara dị ka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ atọ kachasị elu na Oxford University Africa Innovation Fair.
A mụrụ Bridget ma zụlite na Ghana.  Ọ kwagara United States ka ya na ndị mụrụ ya biri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ma gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Swarthmore College, wee gụchaa nzere bachelọ na Economics..
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Swarthmore College, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmepe na agụmakwụkwọ tupu ọ kwaga Ghana.

Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na She Leads Africa ebe ọ na-arụrịta ụka banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa, ụmụ nwanyị, akụ na ụba na ọchụnta ego. Na Ghana, o guzobere TalentsinAfrica na ChaleKasa. TalentsinAfrica bụ ikpo okwu na-akwado AI na-akwado iji nweta ohere maka ndị na-eto eto Afrịka, ebe ChaleKasa bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe omume ndị a haziri ahazi iji jikọta ndị Diasporans na ndị Afrịka
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Women's Corner GH na onye na-eme atụmatụ maka ndị Afrịka na China.

N'ime ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke Iri abụọ na asaa  ya, Bridget jikọrọ aka na Crowdfrica.org iji mepụta Bridget Gives @ 27, ọrụ nzụlite ego nke ọ na-eji nyere aka nweta $2,000 site n'aka ndị enyi ya na ezinụlọ ya iji kwado inye ndị Ohua Ghana nlekọta ahụike.
